title: Uthgardt Shaman
contents: property | Skills | Medicine +4, Nature +4, Perception +4, Survival +6
description | Innate Spellcasting | The shaman can innately cast the following spells (spell save DC 12; +4 to hit with spell attacks) with a sacred bundle.
description | At will | dancing lights, mage hand, message, thaumaturgy
description | 1/day each | augury, bestow curse, cordon of arrows, detect magic, hex, prayer of healing, speak with dead, spirit guardians
description | 1/day from trive | expeditious retreat, find steed (elk only), haste

description | Spear | Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage, or 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.
description | Shortbow | Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (ld6 + 1) piercing damage.
